scripts.zcli:validate: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path dist_app) { Remove-Item dist_app -Recurse -Force }; mkdir dist_app -Force; Copy-Item assets, translations, manifest.json dist_app -Recurse -Force; zcli apps:validate dist_app; Remove-Item dist_app -Recurse -Force"
scripts.zcli:package: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path dist_app) { Remove-Item dist_app -Recurse -Force }; mkdir dist_app -Force; Copy-Item assets, translations, manifest.json dist_app -Recurse -Force; zcli apps:package dist_app; if (!(Test-Path tmp)) { mkdir tmp }; Move-Item dist_app/tmp/*.zip tmp/ -Force; Remove-Item dist_app -Recurse -Force; Write-Host 'Package created in ./tmp folder' -ForegroundColor Green"
